criteria: Model accurately represents two objects interacting through electric or magnetic fields.
Model illustrates the forces between objects due to the interaction.
Model explains changes in energy of the objects due to the interaction.
Explanation of Cause and Effect relationships are presented.
descriptions: Model is missing or does not show any interaction between objects.

Model is exceptionally clear, detailed, and accurate, demonstrating a thorough understanding of the interaction and field dynamics.
